application.name: kaguyami2isis
application.brief: Import PDS formatted Kaguya MI image cube into Isis format cube
application.description: This program will import a PDS formatted Kaguya MI VIS and NIR level 1 (EDR) image into an Isis cube. The image will be flipped in the line direction if the UPPER_LEFT_LATITUDE and LOWER_LEFT_LATITUDE are inverted.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input PDS formatted Kaguya MI VIS or NIR file
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the Kaguya MI VIS or NIR EDR filename. This file must contain the PDS labels.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the output filename
